dublin_core.dcvalue: Innovative approaches can strengthen patient caregiver clinician information exchange and more effectively address the physical and psychosocial challenges of advanced disease This study reports initial findings from implementation of the Clinician Report CR a patient and caregiver status report tool accessible by the oncology clinic team
Journal of the American Medical Informatics Association : JAMIA
Development and implementation of a clinician reporting system for advanced stage cancer: initial lessons learned.
